1.title: Switched

episode of.title: Here or There 2: The Lodge (TV Mini-Series 2016)

1.plot: There is a survivor from the missing women's list: it's a Jamaican woman. She suggests to Marc how to kill all the vampires with a big fire. During the night when she is asleep, she wakes up suddenly. Marc follows her, discovering where are all the vampires. And he kills all of them.

2.title: A Dangerous Love

episode of.title: Here or There 2: The Lodge (TV Mini-Series 2016)

2.plot: The Jamaican woman is coming back her home. Her husband, a native of Italy, is having a strong discussion by phone with his lover, a Chinese girl. He has to interrupt it suddenly when he sees his wife is got home. His wife still needs a more blood analysis to the hospital, to make clear she can't become a vampire again. But, at the moment she arrived at the main gate of the hospital, she turns back. The Chinese girl is now at the Italian's home. They are still having a strong discussion. And suddenly she bites his eyebrow, getting out of his house. The Jamaican woman ...

3.title: Elsewhere

episode of.title: Here or There 2: The Lodge (TV Mini-Series 2016)

3.plot: Marc comes back at the car accident place, discovering that the car hits a passerby before that it was crashed against the tree. At the morgue Marc recognizes in that passerby the niece of the Jamaican woman. Marc tries to notice it to her by phone. After that he goes out of his house, and a mysterious man in black begins to follow him.

4.title: The Lodge

episode of.title: Here or There 2: The Lodge (TV Mini-Series 2016)

4.plot: The man in black is identical to Marc. Marc is amazed and scared. The man in black informs Marc that he also can become as all of them, staying with Alisa forever. He will never die anymore. Marc wakes up. It seems it was been a nightmare only. But when Marc goes back at the morgue, he can't find the corpse of the Jamaican woman's niece. Marc tries to find that place out where he met the man in black in his nightmare. And when he find it, he recognizes that man in black from far.
